long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Colora is an incredibly lightweight, pure, and entirely free screenshot enhancement tool that refrains from abusing permissions. It employs the most basic yet effective technologies, all without any ads. Its core logic is impressively compact, weighing in at less than 5 KB.

Say goodbye to tedious and mundane design techniques. With just a single click, you can transform your images into stunning, breathtaking masterpieces, making photo editing a joy. That's Colora for you – come experience it now!
